      • putFlags

        public Baos putFlags(boolean[] flags)
        Flags serialized are a succession of 7 boolean bits, followed by one control bit telling if there's another 8 bits coming or not.
        Parameters:
        flags - An array of boolean to serialize
        Returns:
        the Baos instance for further serialization

      • putShort

      • putVersionControl

        public Baos putVersionControl(int version,
                     Baos b)
        Serializes a version-controlled structure. The structure just has to serialize itself in a bew baos, then it calls baos.versionControl(X, newBaos) on the give baos. (X obviously being the version of the serialization)
        Parameters:
        version - The version of the serialization
        b - The serialized content
        Returns:
        Self
